Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class ReadingRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.ReadingRoom
  • public class ReadingRoom
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the Reading Room in the Readers-Writers Problem. It's place where Readers and Writers come to read/write. Reading Room's maximum capacity is 1 Writer or 5 Readers at a time. Writers can't enter Reading Room when Readers are inside, and similarly when Writer is inside, no Readers can enter.

      Reading Room constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadingRoom

        public ReadingRoom()
        Reading Room constructor. Initializes writing lock, reading lock and counters.

    • Method Detail

      • guard

        public void guard()
        The method symbolise Guard staying in front of the Reading Room who prevents coming writers/readers from breaking the problem's rules.

      • readingRoomRulesValidation

        public boolean readingRoomRulesValidation()
        The method used by the Guard to let Readers or Writers enter Reading Room on condition that there is available space for them. Guard notifies readers/writers when reading room is available and lets them enter in.

      • canWriterEnter

        public boolean canWriterEnter()
        The method used for checking if Writer can enter the Reading Room. Writer can enter Reading Room if: - there are no Writers currently in the Reading Room and - there are no Readers currently in the Reading Room
        Returns:
        boolean true: Writer can enter Reading Room false: Writer can't enter Reading Room

      • canReaderEnter

        public boolean canReaderEnter()
        The method used for checking if Reader can enter the Reading Room. Reader can enter Reading Room if: - there are no Writers currently in the Reading Room and - there are less than 5 Readers currently in the Reading Room and - there are less than 3 writers waiting for their turn (condition added to avoid writers' starvation)
        Returns:
        boolean true: Reader can enter Reading Room false: Reader can't enter Reading Room

      • decrementReadCount

        public void decrementReadCount()
        The method used for decrementing the actual number of reading Readers.

      • incrementReadCount

        public void incrementReadCount()
        The method used for incrementing the actual number of reading Readers.

        Returns:
        current number of Readers in the Reading Room
